item.title: Need help again:'(
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In client.java, search for:

public URL getCodeBase

You can edit the Ip address that your client connects to, there.

item.title: Need help again:'(

item.description:

{

public static void main(String args[])
{

        "", "", ""

}
[/code] My problem is that i want to connect to my server to edit stuff and what not, but it wont let me, even though my server is on. And it does not show what IP i want to connect to on the client.
